# Changelog

All notable changes to `filament-plugin-essentials` will be documented in this file.

## 1.0.1 - 2025-11-30

### What's Changed

* refactor(core): allow UnitEnum in navigationGroup by @aymanalareqi in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/5
* Bump stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action from 6 to 7 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/6
* Bump actions/checkout from 5 to 6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/9

### New Contributors

* @aymanalareqi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/5

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/compare/1.0.0...1.0.1

## 1.0.0 - 2025-08-31

### What's Changed

* Bump aglipanci/laravel-pint-action from 2.5 to 2.6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/2
* Bump actions/checkout from 4 to 5 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/3
* Stable/1.0.0 by @bezhanSalleh in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/4

### New Contributors

* @bezhanSalleh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/pull/4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bezhanSalleh/filament-plugin-essentials/compare/1.0.0-beta...1.0.0
